wikipedia_page.main: John Hinton was an English professional footballer who played at inside left for Southampton  in the Southern League in 1915 and for Exeter City in the Football League Third Division in 1921.

response: *John Hinton (rugby) (1860–1931), Wales international rugby union player
*John Hinton (footballer), English footballer active in the 1910s and 1920s
*John Hinton (priest), Archdeacon of Ossory from 1700 to 1713
*John Hinton (Dean of Tuam) (1672–1743), Anglican priest in Ireland
*John Hinton, footballer, was born in Southampton
